name: Little Greeble Helper (Music Ver. In DL's)
name_original: Little Greeble Helper (Music Ver. In DL's)
description:
• PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING
  • WARNING: There are flashing lights that happen during screen or room changes.
  • UPDATE: The music version should now work properly. Re-download the latest zip to fix it
  • WASD - To move and interact with objects
  • If you want to play with the music enabled you have to download the music version and open the HTML file.
  • I recommend letting the text auto scroll instead of trying to force the text by hitting a key.

Explore a small game made with bitsy, where you see what cats are up to when we can't see what their chasing.

Little Greeble Helper is the second full game I've released and I'm pretty excited to share it with everyone. It's the first game I made that is story driven through the text compare to my previous game creeping cold. Which was a game with pretty little text. Hopefully everyone enjoys the game though, I had a lot of fun coming up with the story, art, and music.

Credit to my friend for proofreading and playtesting. He's a poet/writer and was a great support to have through the development of the game. 

I will link his twitter right here  ------> @JesseDomingos2 <--------

Feel free to leave comments below and follow me on my twitter and check out Creeping Cold if your up for trying out another game I made.

Follow  my twitter to see my art or other things I'm working on: @Chio_Butterfly

Everything was made using Bitsy, BeepBox, and  Bitsymuse. Attached to each of those are links that will bring you to their page.

The game is free so no pressure to donate unless you want to and if you do any amount is appreciated. At the end of the day though I just want people to have fun and show people the game so others can have fun as well.

Disclaimer: Feel free to use the music in other projects just make sure to credit me please.
